properties.description: Demonstrate how to make these file loading processes into an incremental daily process

source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(LastModifytime) as NewWatermarkvalue from data_source_table

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from data_source_table where LastModifytime > '@{activity('Lookup Old WM').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and LastModifytime <= '@{activity('Lookup New WM').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'
